perturbation.original_text: A. CONSULTANT'S "ENDORSEMENT" means the right to use the CONSULTANT'S name, fame, nickname, autograph, voice, facsimile, signature, photograph, likeness, and image in connection with the marketing, advertising, promotion and sale of ADAMS GOLF'S PRODUCT.
perturbation.changed_text: A. CONSULTANT'S "ENDORSEMENT" means the right to use the CONSULTANT'S name, fame, nickname, autograph, voice, facsimile, signature, photograph, likeness, and image solely in ADAMS GOLF'S internal documentation.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'ENDORSEMENT' broadly for marketing and sales. The changed text restricts 'ENDORSEMENT' to only internal documentation. This contradicts later sections (e.g., Section 3) that rely on the broader definition for promotional activities.
perturbation.contradicted_text: CONSULTANT'S OBLIGATIONS 3. CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT CONSULTANT hereby gives and grants to ADAMS GOLF the exclusive right and license to use CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT in connection with the manufacture, sale, distribution, advertising and promotion of PRODUCT in the CONTRACT TERRITORY.

perturbation.original_text: B."PRODUCT" shall mean all golf clubs including, but not limited to, metal woods, drivers, fairway woods, irons, iron- woods, utility clubs, wedges, and putters, bags, and headwear.
perturbation.changed_text: B."PRODUCT" shall mean only metal woods and drivers.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'PRODUCT' encompasses a wide range of golf equipment. The modified definition narrows 'PRODUCT' to only metal woods and drivers. This will contradict Section 5, which speaks about mandatory product which goes beyond just metal woods and drivers.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 5. EXCLUSIVE USE OF PRODUCT During the term of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall exclusively play/use the MANDATORY PRODUCT. (It is expressly understood by the parties that CONSULTANT may play [* ****] clubs in the bag other than ADAMS GOLF clubs including, but not limited to, a putter by a manufacturer other than ADAMS GOLF but may not endorse those clubs and/or putter.)

perturbation.original_text: During the term of this Agreement, CONSULTANT will conduct himself at all times with due regard to public morals and conventions.
perturbation.changed_text: During the term of this Agreement, CONSULTANT will conduct himself at all times with due regard to public morals and conventions, unless CONSULTANT acts in a manner that brings additional media attention to the ADAMS GOLF'S PRODUCT.
perturbation.explanation: The addition to Section 12 provides a contradictory exception to the consultant's behavior clause. The original text requires good behavior. However, the modification allows the consultant to disregard public morals if they believe it will bring additional media attention to ADAMS GOLF'S PRODUCT. This creates an in-text contradiction, as it suggests that negative publicity is an acceptable exception to the clause requiring the CONSULTANT to maintain an acceptable behavior.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 12. BEHAVIOR During the term of this Agreement, CONSULTANT will conduct himself at all times with due regard to public morals and conventions. If the value of CONSULTANT'S ENDORSEMENT is materially reduced or impaired because CONSULTANT: A.committed or shall commit any public act that involves moral turpitude, B.commits or violates any material foreign, U.S., federal, or other applicable state or local law, C.commits any act which brings him into public disrepute, contempt, scandal or ridicule, or which insults or offends the community, D.makes any statements in derogation, in any material respect, of ADAMS GOLF or any of its affiliates or any of their respective PRODUCT or services and such statement is made to the general public or becomes a matter of public knowledge, then at any time after the occurrence of such act, thing or statement, ADAMS GOLF shall have the right, in addition to its other legal and equitable remedies, to immediately terminate this Agreement, by giving written notice to CONSULTANT. ADAMS GOLF must exercise its right of termination within ninety (90) days of its senior management becoming aware of the conduct giving rise to the right of termination.
